node.name: MNCC Internal Configuration
node.description: This node allows to configure the default codecs for the internal call control handling.

node.name: SMPP Configuration
node.description: This node allows to configure the SMPP interface for interfacing with external SMS applications. This section contains generic/common SMPP related configuration, and no per-ESME specific parameters.

node.name: ESME Configuration
node.description: This node allows to configure one particular SMPP ESME, which is an External SMS Entity such as a SMS based application server. You can define any number of ESME within the SMPP node of the OsmoNITB VTY.
